concept.title: Welcome to AirClassroom!
concept.shortdesc: This is the main page for the Shanks Computer Labs available through AirClassroom.

conbody.p: Welcome and thank you for choosing the Shanks Computer Labs for your event! We here at Virginia Tech are delighted that you have come. Our facilities are among the best in the world, from our labratories to our lecture halls, and we can't wait for you to join us!
